Title: Matters of State
Plot:
The English Reformation is in full swing.
Queen Anne suffers from nightmares and feels threatened by Katherine and her daughter.
Henry pays an unplanned visit to an old friend, Sir John Seymour, father of Jane Seymour.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,offensive language and sex scenes
GuestStars: Joanne King, Guy Carleton, Michael Bates, Stephen Hogan, Paul Bennett, Connor Doyle, Jane Brennan, Tony Flynn, Julia Wakeham, Shane Gately, Michael Pennington, Jack Walsh, Serena Brabazon, Laura Jane Laughlin, Sara
